select data_id, expert_name, email, company_name, company, user_desc, expert_professinal, age_between, age, birth_date, industry_name, industry_id, address, college, province, city, county, amount_count, patent_count, project_count, company_count, achievement_count, bak1, bak2, bak3, bak4, bak5, bak6, user_id, mobile, expert_professional_field, expert_professional_field_name, source, source_id, sex, card_id, card_type, education, header_img, join_project_name, join_project_id, expert_nationality, sys_flag, data_order, del_flag, create_date, create_user, create_user_disp, modify_date, modify_user, modify_user_disp, form_code, data_index, status, audit_status, company_code, update_user, update_date, project_id, project_name, year, political_face, nation, unit_belongs, professional_and_time, administrative_duties, technical_positiion, awards_title, brief_desc, place_origin from zjk_expert where 1=1
and data_id like '%${dataId}%'
and expert_name like '%${expertName}%'
and email like '%${email}%'
and company_name like '%${companyName}%'
and company like '%${company}%'
and user_desc like '%${userDesc}%'
and expert_professinal like '%${expertProfessinal}%'
and age_between like '%${ageBetween}%'
and age like '%${age}%'
and birth_date like '%${birthDate}%'
and industry_name like '%${industryName}%'
and industry_id like '%${industryId}%'
and address like '%${address}%'
and college like '%${college}%'
and province like '%${province}%'
and city like '%${city}%'
and county like '%${county}%'
and amount_count like '%${amountCount}%'
and patent_count like '%${patentCount}%'
and project_count like '%${projectCount}%'
and company_count like '%${companyCount}%'
and achievement_count like '%${achievementCount}%'
and bak1 like '%${bak1}%'
and bak2 like '%${bak2}%'
and bak3 like '%${bak3}%'
and bak4 like '%${bak4}%'
and bak5 like '%${bak5}%'
and bak6 like '%${bak6}%'
and user_id like '%${userId}%'
and mobile like '%${mobile}%'
and expert_professional_field like '%${expertProfessionalField}%'
and expert_professional_field_name like '%${expertProfessionalFieldName}%'
and source like '%${source}%'
and source_id like '%${sourceId}%'
and sex like '%${sex}%'
and card_id like '%${cardId}%'
and card_type like '%${cardType}%'
and education like '%${education}%'
and header_img like '%${headerImg}%'
and join_project_name like '%${joinProjectName}%'
and join_project_id like '%${joinProjectId}%'
and expert_nationality like '%${expertNationality}%'
and sys_flag like '%${sysFlag}%'
and data_order like '%${dataOrder}%'
and del_flag like '%${delFlag}%'
and create_date like '%${createDate}%'
and create_user like '%${createUser}%'
and create_user_disp like '%${createUserDisp}%'
and modify_date like '%${modifyDate}%'
and modify_user like '%${modifyUser}%'
and modify_user_disp like '%${modifyUserDisp}%'
and form_code like '%${formCode}%'
and data_index like '%${dataIndex}%'
and status like '%${status}%'
and audit_status like '%${auditStatus}%'
and company_code like '%${companyCode}%'
and update_user like '%${updateUser}%'
and update_date like '%${updateDate}%'
and project_id like '%${projectId}%'
and project_name like '%${projectName}%'
and year like '%${year}%'
and political_face like '%${politicalFace}%'
and nation like '%${nation}%'
and unit_belongs like '%${unitBelongs}%'
and professional_and_time like '%${professionalAndTime}%'
and administrative_duties like '%${administrativeDuties}%'
and technical_positiion like '%${technicalPositiion}%'
and awards_title like '%${awardsTitle}%'
and brief_desc like '%${briefDesc}%'
and place_origin like '%${placeOrigin}%'
order by ${iSortCol} ${sSortDir_0}
